summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2049, for the improvement of Halladay Street, from Fourth Avenue North to Glen Ridge Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same; by constructing concrete sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 20561, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
